titleStmt.title: Bosvvorth-field with a taste of the variety of other poems, left by Sir Iohn Beaumont, Baronet, deceased: set forth by his sonne, Sir Iohn Beaumont, Baronet; and dedicated to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, John, Sir, 1583-1627.
Beaumont, John, Sir, d. 1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for Henry Seile, and are to be sold at the Tygers head in Saint Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: P. 181-2 are cancelled in all recorded copies.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
